text:
<@U5STGTB3J> The Nature of Order seems very interesting, going to read it so thanks for the heads up.

I intuitively have had somewhat similar ideas about order and the natural formation of systems, I struggle to even articulate most of my ideas on it, so this seems like a rabbit-hole waiting for me!
